record.title: MORNING BUSINESS

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that we now proceed to a period of morning business, with Senators permitted to speak therein for up to 10 minutes each.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent to speak for such time as I might consume.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
